Description: Bronze figure of Bastet as a cat-headed woman wearing a long garment with incised patterns; the left hand originally held a sistrum(now lost) and the right holds an aegis to the breast; hieroglyphic text around the edges of the plinth; tang beneath.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2006-2007 6 Oct-18 Feb, Tokyo, National Museum of Nature and Science, Mummy: The Inside Story 2007 17 Mar-17 Jun, Kobe City Museum, Mummy: The Inside Story
Acquisition name: Donated by: Mrs Marion Whiteford Acworth JP
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Dr Joseph John Acworth
